Honghui Zhang

Researcher of Computer Vision and Machine Learning.

Contact me

Experience

DJI

Senior Algorithm Engineer, DJI • Jun, 2014 — Jan, 2016

Leader of a computer vision research team, working on visual/IMU-aided SLAM, stereo vision and deep learning for UAV.

Department Manager, DJI • Jan, 2016 — Present

Manager of the vision perception department.

Lenovo

Staff Researcher • Jun, 2013 — Jun, 2014

Computer vision research and prototype system development for PC and mobile platform, focusing on 3D reconstruction and modeling from multi-view images and stereo vision related applications.

The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology

Postdoc Research Fellow • Sep, 2012 — Jun, 2013

Working on visual tracking for intelligent video surveillance, scene understanding of large scale street view with images and lidar point cloud.
